subject: Football (College)
Brain
Concussions
Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
lead_paragraph: Nearly 20 years and more than 100 pounds ago, Ryan Hoffman was a hulking offensive lineman for North Carolina. He ended up a panhandler plagued with short-term memory problems and other troubles.
